legacy.full_text: The two idiots think “WOW, this is the huge and precise blow to China!”

One thing Miles Yu and other dissidents dare not to tell their masters is when US consulate in Chengdu is required to close, people who they thought “repressed” by CPC voluntarily walk there: watch the consulate while enjoy a cold drink and set crackers to celebrate.

Maochun Miles Yu and other pro-US “scholars” cried for China’s collapse for decades but only see a more powerful China. When their good days are passing, they met @realDonaldTrump and @Sec_Pompeo and are eager to sell “let Chinese people overturn CPC” theory to the two idiots.

legacy.description: 欢迎来到美国驻华使领馆的“推特”平台！这里是活动文字直播、思想交流、文化分享的开放平台。本帐号使用条款可在以下链接找到：https://t.co/7fIbxneOkc有时候，我们的内容会将关注者定向到非美国政府网站，此处包含的链接仅供参考，不一定代表美国政府或美国国务院观点或背书。关注伯恩斯大使的官方账号: @USAmbChina

value.string_value: 共产主义中国和自由世界的未来

legacy.full_text:
“我们…必须与中国人民接触和赋予他们能力——他们是充满活力、热爱自由的人民，与中国共产党完全不同。这要始于面对面的外交。我在一切所到之处都见到才华优秀和勤奋的男女中国人。”

点击这里阅读更多迈克尔·R·蓬佩奥国务卿7月23日关于中国的讲话：

https://t.co/7nrlO9p9G3
故事是这样的：余茂春等民运们喊了几十年中国崩溃，熬得自己无法勃起了，中国却越来越坚挺。眼见混不下去，没想遇上特蓬二人，于是就把“拉中国人民反共”的一套倾销给这两傻子，二傻觉得这是“最懂中国”的，但余茂春们不敢告诉主子的是：昨天成都领事馆门前，“被迫害的中国人”在刷手机嗦冰粉儿放鞭炮。
RT @SpokespersonCHN: 蓬佩奥在尼克松总统图书馆的讲话表明他想把自己塑造成21世纪的杜勒斯，在一个全球化的世界对华搞新的十字军东征。他的所作所为形象地展现了什么叫“蚍蜉撼树“。现在是到了全世界所有爱好和平的人站出来阻止他给世界造成更大危害的时候了。

legacy.description: Author, 'When China Rules the World', columnist, broadcaster, speaker. Chair of @HariVeriahTrust
legacy.name: Martin Jacques

legacy.full_text: 1/6 We are in a new Cold War. The US sees China as its enemy. Why the change? Before the 2008 financial crisis it believed China's rise was unsustainable. They were wrong; instead the 2008 crisis undermined the US. So it now sees China's rise as a threat to its global hegemony.

legacy.full_text: 英國媒體透露了16日的中印邊界衝突。遠比外界想像慘烈。1）中國軍隊差不多打了一場伏擊戰。中國明顯事先有準備，木棍上面佈滿鐵定，參戰人數6倍於印軍。2）整個打鬥持續時間長達6小時。3）中國軍人切斷了印度軍人的退路，印軍死亡的人大部分是因掉入山崖下冰川凍死的。
注意⚠️  “切断退路”，谁越界挑衅一目了然。

legacy.full_text:
An upcoming documentary — “Tianshan: Still standing - Memories of fighting terrorism in Xinjiang” — will be released soon.

It is filmed from the POV of survivors & witnesses of terrorism in #Xinjiang and shows a clearer picture of Xinjiang's battle against terrorism. https://t.co/zxeycOFx9d

This is a partial history of the terrorist attacks in Xinjiang over the past decades, as told by survivors and witnesses. We salute their courage in speaking out. This video contains scenes that some viewers may find disturbing, so discretion is advised.
